channel.title: How do i change the max items allowed for a shop
channel.description: when i added ghost i can't add in more then 1 item to the shop can anyone tell me how to fix this? i will ++rep you

item.title: How do i change the max items allowed for a shop
item.dc:creator: @aber aber
item.description:
@aber wrote:

if i do that i can add more then 1 item in the ghost shop?[br][size=1]Posted at: November 22, 2006, 07:59:55 PM[/size][hr]billy thank you so much i will rep you only person that helped me to lol thanks alot

item.title: How do i change the max items allowed for a shop
item.dc:creator: @billygotshot billygotshot
item.description:
@billygotshot wrote:

when you made the name of the shop it has underscores right so say you named it this

That_is_awesome

you have the underscores? also use tabs[br][size=1]Posted at: November 22, 2006, 07:42:52 PM[/size][hr]here is an example

shop = 44	Fish_For_PKing					1	1	385	10000	391	10000

.[br][size=1]Posted at: November 22, 2006, 05:54:19 PM[/size][hr].[br][size=1]Posted at: November 22, 2006, 05:58:36 PM[/size][hr].[br][size=1]Posted at: November 22, 2006, 06:03:21 PM[/size][hr]omg no one can help me no one got the brains for this thread eh?[br][size=1]Posted at: November 22, 2006, 06:48:51 PM[/size][hr].[br][size=1]Posted at: November 22, 2006, 07:01:52 PM[/size][hr]This is the stupid error i get when i try to add more then 1 item to the ghost shop it works fine when i add items like in shop keepers but i want another npc selling stuff to so here it is
gives me this error when i try to add more then 1 item to the shop at ghost shopkeeper

item.title: How do i change the max items allowed for a shop
item.dc:creator: @mod_taharok Taharok
item.description:
@mod_taharok wrote:

oo I know the issue. Make sure you have TABS INSTEAD OF SPACES when putting in the codes for the items. This will take away your compiling error

Read full topic

i edited it again, try changing the shop id then editing the items again.[br][size=1]Posted at: November 22, 2006, 12:34:41 AM[/size][hr]i had this problem once when my shop sold 10 sets of 32000 cannon barrels… simlilar to this i changed the id of the shop and edited the items and it worked. you know what just post ur shops.cfg here and ill edit it for ya.
